titlepage.titleproper: Preliminary Inventory to the K. Nagy Collection, 1942-1962
titlepage.publisher:
Hoover Institution Archives
Stanford University
Stanford, California
titlepage.p: © 1998 Hoover Institution Archives. All rights reserved.

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.abstract: Interview transcripts, reports, clippings, and printed matter, relating to the Hungarian Revolution of 1956, political events in Hungary during World War II, the trial of Edgar Sanders in 1950-1951, and the espionage trial of Oleg Penkovskii and Greville Wynne in 1962.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: The Hoover Institution Archives only allows access to copies of audiovisual items. To listen to sound recordings or to view videos or films during your visit, please contact the Archives at least two working days before your arrival. We will then advise you of the accessibility of the material you wish to see or hear. Please note that not all audiovisual material is immediately accessible.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: For copyright status, please contact the Hoover Institution Archives.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], K. Nagy collection, [Box no.], Hoover Institution Archives.

did.unittitle: Miscellaneous documents concerning the Hungarian Revolution of 1956
The British press on Hungary [1 of 2], 1956 October-December (clippings)
The British press on Hungary [2 of 2], 1956 October-December (clippings)
"Hungarian News Survey" (A Summary of News from Radio and Press Sources), London, 1942-45
Trial of G. M. Wynne and Penkovsky, 1962 (clippings)
Müvelt Nép, 1956 (organ of Imre Nagy's circle, Hungarian newspaper)
Rákosi Mátyás: Élete Képekben (Mathew Rakosy: His Life in Photographs), Budapest, 1952
Magyar Közlöny: A Magyar Népköztársasag Hivatalos Lapja (Hungarian News Release: The Official Paper of the People's Republic of Hungary), Budapest, 1956

scopecontent.p: Formerly security-classified records of the British government, released in full. Arranged chronologically by date of release by Hoover, thereunder by British office

did.unittitle: 2011 January release, Political Warfare Executive Weekly Directive for B.B.C. Hungarian Service
2011 January release, Political Warfare Executive, South Eastern Europe, Intelligence Section Weekly Intelligence Summary
